ygData.subject: Re: Worth it to practice 1h blunt?
ygData.msgSnippet: What s this level 40 nonsense?  an effect is an effect, or so they would have us believe. ... _________________________________________________________ Do You
ygData.messageBody:
What's this level 40 nonsense? an effect is an effect, or so they
would have us believe.


--- Silverlock <croesus@...> wrote:
> From: Silverlock <croesus@...>
>
> At 09:57 AM 6/21/99 -0700, you wrote:
>
> Not with a neg 9 charisma stat. No I think I will
> keep looking for a fanges
> skull stilleto to match my Draggon Dirk and
> Sacraficial Dagger. I charm too
> much to consider dropping 9 charisma so I can gain
> an occasional chaotic
> feedback after level 40. The chaotic feedback only
> fires after level 40 and
> only if you hit the mob in melee, how many of us are
> going to want to get
> that close to a level 40 mob anyway?
>
> >From: HiFi Review <hifireview@...>
> >
> >Which we all plan on doing, right?
> >
> >
> >--- "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...> wrote:
> >> From: "Farr, Robert" <robert.farr@...>
> >>
> >> The only reason that I can see practicing 1h
> blunt
> >> is if you plan on getting
> >> a Staff of Writhing.
> >>
> >> > -----Original Message-----
> >> > From: Scott Murawski
> [SMTP:scott@...]
> >> > Sent: Monday, June 21, 1999 9:09 AM
> >> > To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> >> > Subject: [eqenchanters] Worth it to practice 1h
> >> blunt?
> >> >
> >> > From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>
> >> >
> >> > I didn't get a 1h blunt weapon (cracked staff)
> >> until I turned like level
> >> > 10, but I didn't practice it much.
> >> > I think my skill is (1).
> >> >
> >> > My piercing and 2h blunt are good though.
> >> >
> >> > Should I try hard and increase it?
> >> > You can only increase mele skills on blues or
> >> above, right?
> >> >
> >> > Thanks
> >> > Azboklin the enchanter
> >> >
> >> >
> >>
>
